topics.title: SigmaRand Introduction and Problem Definition
topics.summary: Introduction to SigmaRand for secure random number generation on Ergo blockchain. Explains the fundamental challenge of generating randomness on blockchain where all nodes must agree, and how naive approaches can be manipulated by miners or attackers.

topics.title: Commit-Reveal Protocol Solution Architecture
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of the two-phase commit-reveal protocol implementation with client-server model. Shows how Alice commits a hash of her random number first, Bob commits his random number, then Alice reveals her number to generate final randomness via XOR operation.

topics.title: Security Mechanisms and Anti-Malicious Safeguards
topics.summary: Describes security features including refund mechanisms for non-responsive servers, pledge requirements to prevent malicious behavior, and timeout protections. Ensures neither party can gain unfair advantage or prevent protocol completion.

topics.title: Token-Based Implementation and User-Defined Scripts
topics.summary: Explains how clients can redeem tokens (like NFTs) for random numbers through the protocol. The final state locks both token and random number in user-defined ErgoScript contracts, allowing flexible integration with various applications.

topics.title: API Design and Transaction Flow
topics.summary: Details the three-API system for client interaction and corresponding transaction types (hash, commit, reveal). Includes workflow states from registration through completion with polling mechanisms for transaction confirmation.

topics.title: NFT Pack Opening Use Case Example
topics.summary: Practical example showing how SigmaRand enables fair NFT pack opening with different rarity distributions. Demonstrates the complete flow from pack token redemption to rare NFT distribution using secure random numbers.

topics.title: Live Demonstration of SigmaRand Protocol
topics.summary: Complete live demo showing random number generation, Blake2b256 hashing, API calls, transaction signing and confirmation. Demonstrates the working system with real transactions on Ergo blockchain and API responses.

topics.title: Smart Contract Implementation Details
topics.summary: In-depth explanation of ErgoScript contracts including hash UTXO script conditions, refund mechanisms, proposition bytes validation, and commit UTXO spending conditions. Shows how contracts enforce protocol rules and security.

topics.title: Serverless Architecture and AWS Implementation
topics.summary: Technical overview of the serverless backend architecture using AWS Lambda functions and Step Functions. Explains how different functions handle transaction status polling, commit transactions, and workflow orchestration.

topics.title: Project Completion and GitHub Resources
topics.summary: Demonstration of successful transaction completion and project wrap-up. Provides information about GitHub repository with contracts, working examples, and step-by-step documentation for developers interested in using SigmaRand.
